duties_responsibilities.duty: Underwrite and analyze E&O and Cyber new and renewal policies.
Market facing and production with wholesale brokers.
Administer and monitor underwriting rules and guidelines, insurance laws and regulations and rating manual rules.
Manage a portfolio of accounts and developing a pipeline of business.
Collaborate and cross sell with other stakeholders and lines of business within Zurich.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in a related field (Preferred)
